protein.specific_function: Methylates the carboxyl group of the C-terminal leucine residue of protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunits to form alpha-leucine ester residues.

reference.reference_text: De Baere I, Derua R, Janssens V, Van Hoof C, Waelkens E, Merlevede W, Goris J: Purification of porcine brain protein phosphatase 2A leucine carboxyl methyltransferase and cloning of the human homologue. Biochemistry. 1999 Dec 14;38(50):16539-47.
